itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Person\"><a href=\"https://skintdad.co.uk/author/skint-dad/\" class=\"entry-author-link\" itemprop=\"url\" rel=\"author\"><span class=\"entry-author-name\" itemprop=\"name\">Skint Dad</span></a></span> | last updated <time class=\"entry-modified-time\" itemprop=\"dateModified\" datetime=\"2016-08-16T18:03:21+00:00\">16th August 2016</time> <span class=\"entry-comments-link\"><a href=\"https://skintdad.co.uk/start-a-blog-on-wordpress/#disqus_thread\" data-disqus-identifier=\"7714 http://skintdad.co.uk/?p=7714\">16 Comments</a></span> </p></header><div class=\"entry-content\" itemprop=\"text\"><p><strong>Setting up&nbsp;a blog</strong> is easy and today I’m going to show you how. From choosing a domain name to installing WordPress, I’m going to share with you the way I did it.</p>\n<p><strong><a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Click here to start your blog</a> and use the directions&nbsp;below&nbsp;for helpful pointers.</strong></p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7865\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-To-Start-a-WordPress-Blog-with-BlueHost.jpg\" alt=\"Starting a blog is easy and today I'm going to show you how. From choosing a domain name to installing WordPress, I'm going to share with you the way I did it.\" width=\"700\" height=\"400\" data-pin-no-hover=\"true\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-To-Start-a-WordPress-Blog-with-BlueHost.jpg 700w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-To-Start-a-WordPress-Blog-with-BlueHost-300x171.jpg 300w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-To-Start-a-WordPress-Blog-with-BlueHost-332x190.jpg 332w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\"></p>\n<p>Are you after a way of making extra money for your family? Perhaps you fancy working from home while saving money on childcare at the same time?</p><div class=\"insert-post-ads\" style=\"clear:both;float:left;width:100%;margin:0 0 20px 0;\"><div align=\"center\"><script async=\"\" src=\"//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js\"></script>\n<!-- Within content ad 1 -->\n<ins class=\"adsbygoogle\" style=\"display:inline-block;width:336px;height:280px\" data-ad-client=\"ca-pub-1313097034830591\" data-ad-slot=\"1005644065\" data-adsbygoogle-status=\"done\"><ins id=\"aswift_1_expand\" style=\"display:inline-table;border:none;height:280px;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;visibility:visible;width:336px;background-color:transparent\"><ins id=\"aswift_1_anchor\" style=\"display:block;border:none;height:280px;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;visibility:visible;width:336px;background-color:transparent\"><iframe width=\"336\" height=\"280\" frameborder=\"0\" marginwidth=\"0\" marginheight=\"0\" vspace=\"0\" hspace=\"0\" allowtransparency=\"true\" scrolling=\"no\" allowfullscreen=\"true\" onload=\"var i=this.id,s=window.google_iframe_oncopy,H=s&amp;&amp;s.handlers,h=H&amp;&amp;H[i],w=this.contentWindow,d;try{d=w.document}catch(e){}if(h&amp;&amp;d&amp;&amp;(!d.body||!d.body.firstChild)){if(h.call){setTimeout(h,0)}else if(h.match){try{h=s.upd(h,i)}catch(e){}w.location.replace(h)}}\" id=\"aswift_1\" name=\"aswift_1\" style=\"left:0;position:absolute;top:0;\"></iframe></ins></ins></ins></div>\n<script>\n(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});\n</script></div>\n<p>Whatever your motivations are, starting a blog is a great way to earn money and give you the life you want. I started blogging back in 2013 with the hope it would hold me accountable in my journey to become debt free and allow me to create an additional stream of income.</p>\n<p><img class=\"alignright size-full wp-image-7867\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-to-start-your-own-blog.jpg\" alt=\"Starting a blog is easy and today I'm going to show you how. From choosing a domain name to installing WordPress, I'm going to share with you the way I did it.\" width=\"307\" height=\"512\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-to-start-your-own-blog.jpg 614w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/How-to-start-your-own-blog-180x300.jpg 180w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 307px) 100vw, 307px\"></p>\n<p>In less than&nbsp;six months of starting the blog not only did I start to earn a small income from affiliates and advertising, I also started to receive emails from brands who loved my blog and wanted to work with me on a commercial basis.</p>\n<p>Blogging really can provide you with massive opportunities to not only increase your income but to create a business of your own. In just a couple of&nbsp;years from starting the Skint Dad blog I’ve been able to earn a full-time income which is providing my family with the life they deserve.</p>\n<p>As the&nbsp;<strong>number one dad blog in the UK&nbsp;and &nbsp;current Money Blogger of the Year</strong>, I know what it takes to be a successful blogger.</p>\n<p>Today I’m going to take you through the process of starting your own blog step-by-step so you can also start to create that life for yourself.</p>\n<p><strong><a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Click here to get started.</a></strong></p>\n<h2><strong>Starting a blog</strong></h2>\n<p>When I first decided to set up Skint Dad I knew nothing about blogging. WordPress, hosting, domain names; it was all foreign to me and I made plenty of initial mistakes. One thing I did have though was a will to learn what I needed to and to seek out the best advice I could find.</p>\n<p>I’m going to share that advice with you today so that you don’t make the mistakes I did and perhaps this will enable you to start creating an income even quicker.</p>\n<p>The first piece of advice – and the most important one&nbsp;–&nbsp;is that you need to be prepared to put the effort into your blog. Starting a blog is relatively easy as it requires only a very small financial outlay upfront. You don’t need to be a trained journalist, published author or be tech savvy and, as it’s online, the world is your oyster and <strong>the money you can make is uncapped.&nbsp;</strong></p><div class=\"insert-post-ads\" style=\"clear:both;float:left;width:100%;margin:0 0 20px 0;\"><div align=\"center\"><script async=\"\" src=\"//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js\"></script>\n<!-- SD above the fold sidebar 336 x 280 -->\n<ins class=\"adsbygoogle\" style=\"display:inline-block;width:336px;height:280px\" data-ad-client=\"ca-pub-1313097034830591\" data-ad-slot=\"2094080063\" data-adsbygoogle-status=\"done\"><ins id=\"aswift_2_expand\" style=\"display:inline-table;border:none;height:280px;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;visibility:visible;width:336px;background-color:transparent\"><ins id=\"aswift_2_anchor\" style=\"display:block;border:none;height:280px;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative;visibility:visible;width:336px;background-color:transparent\"><iframe width=\"336\" height=\"280\" frameborder=\"0\" marginwidth=\"0\" marginheight=\"0\" vspace=\"0\" hspace=\"0\" allowtransparency=\"true\" scrolling=\"no\" allowfullscreen=\"true\" onload=\"var i=this.id,s=window.google_iframe_oncopy,H=s&amp;&amp;s.handlers,h=H&amp;&amp;H[i],w=this.contentWindow,d;try{d=w.document}catch(e){}if(h&amp;&amp;d&amp;&amp;(!d.body||!d.body.firstChild)){if(h.call){setTimeout(h,0)}else if(h.match){try{h=s.upd(h,i)}catch(e){}w.location.replace(h)}}\" id=\"aswift_2\" name=\"aswift_2\" style=\"left:0;position:absolute;top:0;\"></iframe></ins></ins></ins>\n<script>\n(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});\n</script></div></div>\n<p>That said, setting up and creating a successful blog which makes money will only be down to the amount of effort and consistency that you are willing to put in. If you are willing though, starting a blog could be the smartest and most lucrative decision you have ever made.</p>\n<h2><strong>Setting up your blog</strong></h2>\n<h3><strong>1. Choosing web hosting for your blog</strong></h3>\n<p>So you’ve decided to start a blog and now you need to decide where your blog will be hosted. Hosting is where your blog is stored online and it’s here where you can manage all the behind-the-scenes technical stuff.</p>\n<p>I recommend <a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">choosing Bluehost</a> as your hosting provider as not only do they offer a free domain name for 12 months, they are also very affordable, and their customer service is second to none!</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-7859\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/1-Homepage.png\" alt=\"How To Start a WordPress Blog with BlueHost\" width=\"700\" height=\"280\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/1-Homepage.png 1160w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/1-Homepage-300x120.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\"></p>\n<p>&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Although I’m based in the UK and they are in the States, it didn’t make the slightest bit of difference when I contacted them or paid the monthly fees (if you’re in the UK you are able to take advantage of the stronger pound and pay even less!)</p>\n<p>To sign up for hosting with Bluehost, head over to the site&nbsp;and click on the <a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Get Started Now button</a>.</p>\n<p>It’s at this point where you’ll&nbsp;choose your hosting plan. If in the beginning you’re on a budget like I was then I definitely recommend you choose the&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">$3.95 per month starter&nbsp;plan</a>&nbsp;(due in full) which, with the free domain you’ll receive, is excellent value for money.</p>\n<p>There are other plans for 12 and 24 months although these work out more expensive in the long run.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7860\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/2-Plans.jpg\" alt=\"How To Start a WordPress Blog with BlueHost\" width=\"700\" height=\"551\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/2-Plans.jpg 700w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/2-Plans-300x236.jpg 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\"></p>\n<h3><strong>2. Choose a domain name</strong></h3>\n<p>Once that’s taken care of you now need to&nbsp;chose a name for your blog. This can be really tricky and I would advise you to take a little time not only to think about what you want your domain name to be, but to also think about the topic you will be writing about.</p>\n<p>When I started Skint Dad I spent a good couple of days thinking about what I wanted my blog name to be. I knew I wanted to incorporate being a parent and also have it related to money somehow.</p>\n<p>The word dad was a given but trying to&nbsp;relate the name to money I found wasn’t as straightforward. After a couple of hours playing around with different variations such as <span class=\"skimlinks-unlinked\">dadwithnomoney.com</span> and <span class=\"skimlinks-unlinked\">dadisbroke.com</span>, we finally come up with the idea of calling the blog Skint Dad. Perfect!</p>\n<p>So with the domain name chosen and available we went ahead and secured it. Because I originally went with BlueHost when setting up my blog, they provided me with a domain name for free for the first 12 months.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7861\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/3-Domain-Registration.jpg\" alt=\"How To Start a WordPress Blog with BlueHost\" width=\"700\" height=\"258\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/3-Domain-Registration.jpg 700w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/3-Domain-Registration-300x111.jpg 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\"></p>\n<p>Once you’ve decided on a name <a href=\"http://www.bluehost.com/track/skintdad/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">type it into&nbsp;new domain</a>. You do not need to use the transfer domain.</p>\n<p>Click next to head to the next page where you’ll enter your own information. It’s on this page where you’ll be offered a number of upgrades although I would advise to skip these as they aren’t overly necessary and will only add to the cost.</p>\n<p>Finally enter your payment information – PayPal or credit/debit card – and that’s it. You’ve secured your brand new domain, set up your hosting account and you’re now ready to set up your blog.</p>\n<h3><strong>3.&nbsp;Installing WordPress</strong></h3>\n<p>Once you’ve&nbsp;chosen the domain name and set up your hosting, you’ll now need to install WordPress. You can do this with ease in the dashboard section when you log into your Bluehost account.</p>\n<p>At this point you would have received a welcome email from Bluehost and within that email there will be a link you need to click which will take you to your “cPanel”.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7863\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/4-cPanel.jpg\" alt=\"How To Start a WordPress Blog with BlueHost\" width=\"700\" height=\"400\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/4-cPanel.jpg 700w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/4-cPanel-300x171.jpg 300w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/4-cPanel-332x190.jpg 332w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 700px) 100vw, 700px\"></p>\n<p>Once you’re clicked through the email into your cPanel, follow these three steps:</p>\n<ol>\n<li>Find the part that says “MOJO Marketplace” and then click the “One Click Install” button.</li>\n<li>On the next page, click on the WordPress icon located under ‘Blogs’. You then need to select&nbsp;the ‘Start’ button which will begin&nbsp;the installation. Select the domain name you intend on using.<br>\n<img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7864\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/9-Install-WP.png\" alt=\"How To Start a WordPress Blog with BlueHost\" width=\"564\" height=\"225\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/9-Install-WP.png 564w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/9-Install-WP-300x120.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 564px) 100vw, 564px\"></li>\n<li>After the install, choose your username and password for when you login into your new WordPress website and click Install Now. Just remember to choose a&nbsp;memorable username and password but not easy to guess. Lots of people leave the username as Admin and wonder why their site gets hacked!</li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-7866\" src=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/10-WP-Login.png\" alt=\"Starting a blog is easy and today I'm going to show you how. From choosing a domain name to installing WordPress, I'm going to share with you the way I did it.\" width=\"635\" height=\"434\" srcset=\"https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/10-WP-Login.png 635w, https://skintdad-theskintdadblog.netdna-ssl.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/10-WP-Login-300x205.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 635px) 100vw, 635px\"></p>\n<h2><strong>That’s it!</strong></h2>\n<h2><strong>You’ve started&nbsp;a blog!</strong></h2>\n<p>And that’s it! You are the proud owner of a sparkly new WordPress blog. There is much work to do as you’ll need to work out how you want your site to look and then start producing content. Exciting!!!</p>\n<h2><strong>What next?!</strong></h2>\n<p>Now it’s all about your&nbsp;design, producing unique and exciting blog posts, building up an audience who want to read what you’ve written and starting to make some money!</p>\n<p>Good luck and have fun!</p>\n<p>Before you have a full launch, it’s best to do a bit of planning and know what you’re going to do. For starters:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Come up with 10-20 blog post ideas and write half of them so you’ve got some posts in the back burner.</li>\n<li>Get started on your social media accounts straight away. Build followers, engage in conversation and start to build a “buzz” even before you’ve released content.</li>\n<li>Sign up with some affiliate networks which should get you on your way to earning money.</li>\n<li>As well as affiliates, sign up with <a href=\"https://www.google.com/adsense/app\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Google Adsense</a>. This allows you to place adverts on your blog and start earning money straight away.</li>\n<li>You don’t need to pay for expensive images (or get sued for copyright infringement). Get free to use stock images from sites like <a href=\"https://pixabay.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Pixabay</a>&nbsp;(our favourite),&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.rgbstock.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">rgbstock</a>&nbsp;or <a href=\"http://www.freerangestock.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">Freerangestock</a>.</li>\n<li>Remember, every time you post a new article don’t forget to share what you’ve written with friends and family, as well on&nbsp;your new social&nbsp;media channels.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Starting a blog may seem daunting and, if I’m honest, it is. The thing you’ve got to remember is that Rome wasn’t built in a day.</p>\n<p>If you’re unsure of anything or want a helping hand – I really do mean this – you can <a href=\"http://skintdad.co.uk/contact-me/\" target=\"_blank\">contact me</a>. If I can help you then great, otherwise I will point you in the right direction.</p>\n<div class=\"saboxplugin-wrap\">\n<div class=\"saboxplugin-gravatar\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/c2acd9c3a4e1742e08734a6e57351d27?s=100&amp;r=g\" srcset=\"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/c2acd9c3a4e1742e08734a6e57351d27?s=200&amp;r=g 2x\" class=\"avatar avatar-100 photo\" height=\"100\" width=\"100\"></div>\n<div class=\"saboxplugin-authorname\"><a href=\"https://skintdad.co.uk/author/skint-dad/\">Skint Dad</a></div>\n<div class=\"saboxplugin-desc\">\n<div class=\"vcard author\"><span class=\"fn\">Ricky Willis is the Founder and Editor of Skint Dad.
